column1: alternative  mechanisms,  including  the  unilateral  use  of  influence  and  force  for  the
resolution of disputes. They may also  seek  to enforce  extra-judicial punishment on
alleged wrongdoers. Thus, for the preservation of public trust in the judicial system,
maintenance of law and order, and to ensure that people have confidence in the Rule
of law, it is essential that orders of courts are enforced.
